issue.title: [Python][Docs] Update type conversion table for pandas <-> arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15043](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15043). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From the mailing list: the table at https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/pandas.html#pandas-arrow-conversion is not fully up to date. For example, it doesn't include `datetime.time` conversion to `time64` type.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15043?focusedCommentId=17472013) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12061
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12061>
